_sText:
Enjoy (it can be hard to do the second surf, it boosts you straight up into the air to the side, you need to strafe in the opposite direction to the surf while boosted into the air so it keeps you aligned in the air with the surf.) I know it's not the longest or greatest map but I'm building a much better one now, should be out in a few months :S i added a video of me surfing it
